resources.string:
Hello, Thank you for volunteering in our project app will be collecting your call logs and SMS data
		We will require you to tag your relationship with the contacts on the next page under 8 primary categories as you deem fit. Please Enter Your Details:
Press next to display CALL records one by one
Press next to display CALL records one by one
Thank you for participating in this mad experiment blah blah blah. Please follow r/IllegallySmolCats on reddit. KTHNXBYE.
Our Kickass Team : Irene, Sumukh, Dhanya, GMK
